directions: Combine water and quinoa in a saucepan over high heat. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cook until water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes.

Whisk sour cream, curry powder, lime juice, ginger, salt, and black pepper together in a large bowl. Add oil; whisk thoroughly. Toss with the quinoa, mango, peanuts, red bell pepper, mint, and jalapeno.
ingredients: 6 ounces vegan sour cream (such as Tofutti®)
2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger
1 (1 pound) firm-ripe mango, cut into 1/2-inch chunks
title: Vegan Curry Quinoa Salad
